<Text: National Geographic World Championship:
2:
--------------------
Text: National Geographic World Championship:  Teams of three students plus one alternate are selected from among those who finished highest in their respective countries' national competitions (e.g. the National Geographic Bee in the U.S.A., the Olimpíada Geográfica Argentina in Argentina or the Australian Geography Competition in Australia).
Triplets:<National Geographic World Championship
4:
--------------------
Text: National Geographic World Championship:  The scores from these two events are tallied, and the top three teams advance to the final round on the second day.
Triplets:<National Geographic World Championship
5:
--------------------
Text: National Geographic World Championship:  The final round consists of questions primarily in the style of the National Geographic Bee, as a moderator (since 1993, Alex Trebek) reads questions to one team or one individual at a time.
Triplets:<National Geographic World Championship
